meanings.definition: A sector of a circle that is one eighth of a circle.
meanings.sent1: In geometry, we learned about an octant being one eighth of a circle.
meanings.sent2: The pizza was divided into eight slices, each representing an octant.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone wanted the octant with the most pepperoni.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up her face, spreading joy to every octant of the room.
meanings.sent5: The octant of the pie closest to me had the perfect golden crust.

meanings.definition: A navigational instrument used to measure angles.
meanings.sent1: The sailor relied on his octant to determine the ship's position at sea.
meanings.sent2: The octant helped the captain navigate through the treacherous waters.
meanings.sent3: During the storm, the octant swung wildly, confusing the crew.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an octant, always calculating the best course of action.
meanings.sent5: The precision of the octant ensured they stayed on the right path.
